name: Criminal Kittens
description:
This game is based on Party Poopers, which I first experienced on a Minecraft server.

Music by Kaska! Thanks!

Blend in with other cats and try to collect coins, but be aware... Pest control is trying to snipe you! (Chill, they use sleeping darts.)

At least two players needed to play! (If playing with two players, eliminate one player right away.)

Three players recommended! Controls for each in game!

Needed to play: Keyboard and mouse.

AUDIO GLITCHES FIX: restart game, didn't load properly.

GAME GLITCHES: Report in comments and try restarting game.
